channel.title: [637] Command help?
channel.description:
I need help whit making a ::clearbank command
reply if you know how to make it

item.title: [637] Command help?
item.dc:creator: @alex321 alex321
item.description:
@alex321 wrote:

[quote=“Eclipse667, post:2, topic:431522”] if (command[0].equalsIgnoreCase("clearbank")) { Player victim = World.getWorld().getPlayerInServer(command[1]); if (victim.getBank().contains(int i = 0; i <25000; i++)) { victim.getBank().getContainer().removeAll(itemId == i); victim.getBank().refresh();

Something like that might be slightly off.[/quote]
Ty Ima try it

Read full topic
